text: Description Brandt is currently seeking a Loader for our Regina, SK location. This position will require mainly working outdoors. Duties & Responsibilities. Working in teams to load trucks and sea containers with finished goods. Inspecting crates and bundles for damage during the loading process. Assist in counting of inventory as required. Keeping area clean and in order at all times. Other duties as assigned. Must have the ability to perform work related duties outside in a safe and competent manner in adverse conditions, extreme heat/cold/ slippery conditions. Must be capable of working under minimum supervision. Must be capable of operating all yard equipment in a safe and efficient manner. Must be physically fit to manually handle all goods, steel and products as required. Must have good positive communication skills and good attendance.

Description

Brandt is currently seeking a Loader for our Regina, SK location. This position will require mainly working outdoors.

Duties & Responsibilities

  • Working in teams to load trucks and sea containers with finished goods
  • Inspecting crates and bundles for damage during the loading process
  • Assist in counting of inventory as required
  • Keeping area clean and in order at all times
  • Other duties as assigned
  • Must have the ability to perform work related duties outside in a safe and competent manner in adverse conditions, extreme heat/cold/ slippery conditions
  • Must be capable of working under minimum supervision
  • Must be capable of operating all yard equipment in a safe and efficient manner
  • Must be physically fit to manually handle all goods, steel and products as required
  • Must have good positive communication skills and good attendance.
"}
